item.title: Frequently asked questions
item.description:
There will be more FAQs added to this page over the next few months as questions come up.

When is the race?

The First Sunday in October (or late September) every year!

Next race: Sunday 28th September 2025

How old must I be to enter the Hopton 10k?

You must be 15 years of age to enter the Hopton 10k race.

When do entries close?

Entries close at midday on the Saturday before the race.

Race Day FAQs
item.description:
When is it?

The First Sunday in October (or late September) every year!

Next race: Sunday 28th September 2025

Registration opens at 8:45 and the race starts at 10.

Where is it?

The race starts at Hopton Primary School, Mirfield, WF14 8PR. It follows roads through Lower Hopton and then enters the woods before returning to the school.

Please enter the school grounds through the playground gate on Chadwick Lane. You will not be able to gain access to the school from any other entrance.

item.title: Sponsorship
item.description:
Are you interested in sponsoring the Hopton 10k? We have various packages available, see the options below. To get in touch and discuss the options in more detail please contact us using the form below.

Package 1: Platinum sponsor (£800) – 1 package available

In return for your support as platinum sponsor, Hopton 10k would provide:

  • Presenting sponsor i.e. “The Hopton 10k brought to you by (Your Company Name Here)”
  • Your company logo in priority position and size on the Hopton 10k T-shirt (awarded to all runners)
  • Your company logo on the Hopton 10k website with a link to your company website
  • A shout out on the Hopton 10k race Facebook page with a link to your website
  • A space at the event to host a display table / promotional stand (provided by sponsor)
  • Acknowledgement on the day over the race PA system
  • Opportunity to place promotional merchandise or materials in the venue
  • Consecutive event sponsorship available (you will get first refusal on next year’s event)
  • Primary sponsor mention and thank you in the event recap on website and Facebook
  • 10 x FREE entries to the race.

item.title: Volunteering
item.description:
At the Hopton 10k, we are always on the lookout for enthusiastic volunteers to help make our event a success. We need around 40 volunteers to run the Hopton 10k safely, and we pride ourselves on having the most enthusiastic and friendly marshals and helpers. If you’re interested in supporting, please drop us an email to info@hopton10k.run or fill in the contact form below.

Marshals

As a marshal, you will need to meet in the school hall at 8:30 am to collect everything you’ll need, such as signs, tape, cones, and a marshal’s info card. After that, you can make your way to your designated marshal spot to set up at your leisure. We need you in place and ready to go by 10 am. You can start packing away at 11:30 or when the sweeper (the volunteer following the person at the back of the race) passes you.
